TopicTitle: Can someone clear the spam from the Bug Tracker?

Articles.Content:
The bug tracker, at https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/ has started getting spambots posting "issues" which are actually ads.

Some of which have stayed in there a while.

Is anyone on top of this and reading the issues?  I'm wondering because the spambot issues aren't being removed or closed, making me wonder if anyone working for SQUAD or Take 2 is even looking at the tracker anymore.
